rules.natural: If a severe drought occurs, then the coal power plant is not active
Either a severe drought occurs or a heat wave occurs
If a heat wave occurs, then the coal power plant is not active

Either the governor activates the national guard, or if the governor declares an energy emergency, then under the condition that the absence of federal funding does not result in solar research not receiving government funding, the energy department implements emergency measures
If the EPA finds the renewable energy facility in compliance, then the renewable energy facility does not violate EPA regulations
If the EPA issues certification to the renewable energy facility, then the EPA finds the renewable energy facility in compliance
If Congress passes the renewable energy bill, then when federal funding is not available, solar research does not receive government funding
Either Congress passes the renewable energy bill or the president vetoes the renewable energy bill

If the congressional committee reviews the energy contract bid, then should neither a competitor company win the energy contract bid nor the completion of construction by the construction company lead to the renewable energy facility becoming operational, the solar company does not protest the energy contract bid
Either the congressional committee reviews the energy contract bid or the congressional committee investigates the energy contract bid
If the congressional committee investigates the energy contract bid, then the congressional committee recommends rebidding the energy contract

If the congressional committee recommends rebidding the energy contract, then provided that neither a competitor company wins the energy contract bid nor the construction company completing construction leads to the renewable energy facility becoming operational, the solar company does not protest the energy contract bid
If the president vetoes the renewable energy bill, then when federal funding is not available, solar research does not receive government funding
If the renewable energy facility becomes operational, then federal funding becomes available
Either the construction company completes construction of the renewable energy facility or the renewable energy facility begins operations
If the renewable energy facility begins operations, then the renewable energy facility becomes operational
If the EPA conducts an inspection of the renewable energy facility, then the EPA issues certification to the renewable energy facility
If the EPA conducts an inspection of the renewable energy facility, then the EPA issues a violation to the renewable energy facility
If the EPA issues a violation to the renewable energy facility, then the renewable energy facility does not violate EPA regulations

Should neither a competitor company win the energy contract bid nor the construction company completing construction lead to the renewable energy facility becoming operational, then the solar company protests the energy contract bid
If the construction company completing construction does not lead to the renewable energy facility becoming operational, then the renewable energy facility violates EPA regulations
Provided that the absence of federal funding does not result in the solar industry receiving tax credits, then the solar industry files a lawsuit against the government
Given that the absence of federal funding does not lead to the solar industry receiving tax credits, the solar industry does not file a lawsuit against the government
If federal funding is not available, then solar research receives government funding
If federal funding is not available, then the coal power plant remains active
If federal funding is not available, then the solar industry does not receive tax credits

The EPA conducts an inspection of the renewable energy facility
The energy department does not implement emergency measures
The governor does not activate the national guard
A competitor company does not win the energy contract bid
